snippet.title: Persona 5 Royal – Change The World Trailer
snippet.description:
Phantom Thieves have the power to change the world! Don the mask of Joker in Persona 5 Royal and join the Phantom Thieves on March 31.

Digital pre-orders will come with an original Persona 5 Royal theme as a bonus and all the original Persona 5 DLC will be free for all Persona 5 Royal players Prepare for an all-new heist in Persona 5 Royal based in the universe of the award-winning series, Persona! 

#P5R steals the show exclusively for the PlayStation®4 system on March 31, 2020 with a Launch Edition and special digital bundles, all available for pre-order now. 

Visit the official website for more details: atlus.com/P5R
Pre-order Persona 5 Royal from your local retailers:
Amazon: http://bit.ly/P5R_LE
GameStop: http://bit.ly/P5R_GSLE

UK: https://amzn.to/2RVi3IC
AUS: http://bit.ly/2RvCLjl
Spain: http://bit.ly/2tLO5iq
France: http://bit.ly/2uFABVa
Germany: https://amzn.to/38P5u8N
Italy: https://amzn.to/318BYIx
